pr_title: DHFPROD-4487: Add user creation to run unit tests

timeline.message: DHFPROD-4487:create user and add role to run unit  tests
DHFPROD-4487:diable  testUploadProject unit test so it  will not delete data-hub-developer role
DHFPROD-4487:fix testUploadProject unit test not to delete role
DHFPROD-4487:fix testUploadProject unit test not to delete role

timeline.bodyText:
Is this actually called? I believe this method must be static - see https://howtodoinjava.com/junit5/after-all-annotation-example/ .
I also don't think there's any need to delete the user, it can be considered part of the test setup. Just make sure it has a name that makes it clear it's for running tests.
timeline.author: rjrudin
rjrudin
